main event: Two witnesses observed two white lights moving horizontally above the tree line in Brooklyn on October 11, 1961.
interesting points: The lights were approximately 1100 yards away and appeared to turn off and on,The witnesses reported a clear and bright starlit night with a yellow moon,The observation lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes,The lights were silent and moved in a straight line, The event was noted in a Project Blue Book record card.
sighted object: two white lights in the sky
witness description: The witnesses observed from different locations and described similar sightings.
